nodes.text: The Jarnollen system was a star system located in the Bright Jewel sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim that contained the planet Jarnollen.

The Jarnollen system was originally created for the Star Wars Legends newspaper comic strip The Bounty Hunter of Ord Mantell, written by Archie Goodwin and penciled by Al Williamson, which ran from February 9 to April 19, 1981. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square L-7.
